author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Melt the butter in a saucepan. Add the onion and sweat for 1-2 minutes until softened. Add the cauliflower and enough water to just cover the ingredients. Stir to combine, bring to the boil and reduce to a simmer for 8-10 minutes or until tender. Drain through a colander and place the cauliflower mixture in a food processor. Add the cheese and cream and blend until you have a thick puree. Season with salt, freshly ground white pepper and pinch of nutmeg.
ingredients: 25g/1oz butter ,  ½ onion, thinly sliced,  1 cauliflower, cut into florets ,  100g/3½oz mature cheddar, grated,  75ml/2½fl oz double cream,  salt and freshly ground white pepper ,  pinch nutmeg
